text: ( music playing )

I need to find
my missing piece.
♪ And be more than a mystery ♪

♪ We're wolves
we own the night ♪
♪ Oh, we own what we own ♪
♪ Oh, we own the night ♪
♪ Oh, we own what we own ♪
♪ We own the night ♪

♪ The only thing that is worse
than our bark's our bite ♪
♪ Oh, we own what we own ♪
♪ We own the night ♪
( howling )

That's it.
The entrance to the secret cave.
Well done, wolves.
Vanna, no!
Well, this complicates things.

- We're too late.
- It's never too late.

( grunting )
Search the walls.

There's gotta be a secret lever
or something

- that opens the cave door.
- ( wolves howling )

We've just gotta push it open.
I'm gonna zombie out.

No, Zed, wait.
I'll do it.
O. M. G.
Told you she was the best.
Wow. Let's go.

( gasps )
Yes.
Here comes the light show.

Huh?
This must be the one.
Vanna, stop!
( grunts )

You're too late.
They're almost here.
Let my friends go!
Vanna, I trusted the good in you

when I should have been
listening to my friends.
Now, you need to trust me.
I can't do that, Addison.

It was nice having a friend
for the first time
in 1,012 years,
but my family comes first.
Now get Vannaized.
Um, what are you doing?

Wha-- no one has ever
been immune to my power.

- What are you?
- I don't know.
